concept.title: What is the Subtraction of Numbers
concept.shortdesc: Here you learn what is subtraction.

conbody.p: And now what I want to do is to add some supporting concept information.
I would like to put it somewhere here close to the subtract functionality to make it clear what this concept is related to, but my first step is to simply create this topic.

and I am going to file new. And in the list of file templates, I enter concept. What I want to use is a concept DITA topic type, so I select this one and now I have to enter the title for my conceptual type of topic, I will simply use a copy paste.
